title: Is it possible to join an NIT and not go for a single class? - Quora

response.answer_text: How dear you put a question like that, it is not possible because you will get MHRD scholar fund so you should have to come in depart. and regularly sign in register book. If you not come and sing by others it possible but if anyone notice that and inform to sir or HoD then you should have to give penalty for that.

Thanks for a2a but this is not at all possible. Earlier it was possible to some extent in our nit  but rules are strict 75% attendence is required in every college of mhrd governance for appearing in end sems. A relaxatiom can be given but not below 60%
